reviewText:
omg! what a wealth of wonderful swift, quick and easy techniques one can use not only for self healing, but
for healing of others on so many levels!  These too can be applied to remove unwanted or non beneficial
energies from one self, for your own home, property and possessions. Sandee provides real in depth
knowledge and understandings of forces at play and possible origins which includes past lives.
She has provided over 30 yrs of  learnings and experience into one condensed format .  The best of
the best.  Such a small fee  and a great cost savings when one considers
the thousands of dollars one would spend to acquire all these intimate, lost and secret knowledge to empower
one self.  Most of these techniques provide healing on a physical, energetic, mental, emotional. psychic and spiritual level
only requires a few moments of one's time. Some pendulum/ dowsing knowledge would be helpful but not necessary
as she also teaches one how to "muscle test" for confirmations. So much impact and knowledge being shared in one
little package .. great for those that are just curious to those starting on a journey for  healing and enlightenment and
especially those for those that are experienced and want to assist others. A Cd for  Handouts is  also provided for
your own reference and to  to assist with following on demonstrations.
One of the most informative  4 DVD sessions  - one can use for many lifetimes.
Thank you Sandee Mac
curious..

Looking forward to utilizing the information Sandee Mac shares in these DVDs.as we have attended 7+ courses/sessions over the past 10 years facilitated by Sandee. Her professional, and many times, humorous approaches to teaching course principles using active participation make the the information memorable and allows each individual to achieve ongoing results not only at that moment but each time going forward.

Excellent set of DVD's. I watched it with my friend and both of us already put 2 "teachings" to use and they worked! I am now going to buy another set for my children to share because I know this workshop will help them overcome some hurtles in their lives. Thank goodness there are "teaching" DVD'S like this out there.
